item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: My vote is for the original JPG- the color is so crisp and rich. Initially didn't care for the tonemapped one (colors lokked artificila)but on second glance I actually like the effect of smaller pines (center and lower left.) Is this the watercolor effect you refer to? Color seems a bit more vivid with the manual setting. THANK YOU for the photos of Nika's belly!!!
item.content:encoded:
My vote is for the original JPG- the color is so crisp and rich. Initially didn’t care for the tonemapped one (colors lokked artificila)but on second glance I actually like the effect of smaller pines (center and lower left.) Is this the watercolor effect you refer to?
Color seems a bit more vivid with the manual setting.
THANK YOU for the photos of Nika’s belly!!!
